Name: BattanKing
Notes: A large stone block boss. He can summon Whimps that will try to attack the player like Whomps do. The boss himself can defeat those smaller blocks by crushing them. Like his smaller counterparts, this boss will try to fall onto the player to attack them. He can also attack using shockwaves that appear when he jumps. When he's lying on ground, the player can Ground Pound the weak spot on its back to damage him. After hitting the boss three times, he will be defeated. He always spawns a Power Star.

Obj_arg7.Name: Camera Register Starting Index
Obj_arg7.Description: Specifies the starting index of the camera vector register. Occupies two cameras.

SW_DEAD.Description: Gets activated after defeating the boss.

SW_A.Description: Starts the intro cutscene if the switch gets activated.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

GeneralPos.Description: バッタンキング基準位置 is used as his position after the battle. マリオ位置 is used to position the player after the battle.

DemoCast.Description: Registers to the cutscenes with the names バッタンキング登場 and バッタンキングダウン. They are used when the boss should appear or disappear, respectively.

BaseMtxFollowTarget.Description: Can be followed by another BaseMtxFollower object.

Message.Description: BattanKing000 specifies the introduction text. BattanKing001 specifies the text after defeating him.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: Continues movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc.
